intro: Terror awaits in the shadows. Will you survive?
description:
Step into the shoes of a fearless hunter in Werewolf Hunter - Survive the Howl, an intense survival game. Experience the chilling thrill of the hunt as you battle deadly werewolves and other lurking threats in the darkness.

Key Features:
	•	Immersive First-Person Perspective: Navigate the eerie wilderness through a first-person camera, ensuring a close and intense survival experience.
	•	Dynamic Movement and Combat: Move fluidly through the environment while switching seamlessly between shooting from the hip and aiming down sights for precise combat. Engage enemies with firearms or melee weapons for versatile gameplay.
	•	Interactive World: Explore a richly detailed environment where you can open doors, activate your flashlight, and use night vision to uncover hidden threats in the darkness.
	•	Strategic Survival Tools:
	•	Use medkits to restore health in critical moments.
	•	Set traps and bait to outwit cunning werewolves.
	•	Deploy motion sensors to detect approaching threats.
	•	Explosive Gameplay: Create powerful explosions to eliminate enemies or distract them.
	•	Engaging AI Behavior: Encounter intelligent werewolves and wildlife with realistic behaviors, making every encounter tense and unpredictable.
	•	Loot and Crafting: Scavenge for valuable items that spawn randomly. Defeat enemies to earn rare drops, enhancing your gear and arsenal.
	•	Random Events: Brace yourself for unexpected encounters and events that can change the course of your hunt.

Survive the night, hunt your prey, and become the ultimate werewolf hunter. Are you ready to endure the howl?
